default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You, illuminated the darkest depths of the sea bed, awakening me, and my distant memories. My human companion, I have waited for you for so long, so very long.

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: As long as the environment keeps changing, evolution will never cease.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I will reach the deepest fathoms of the sea.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Begin exploring... these waters.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Threat eliminated. I can dive deeper now.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: The Abyss will devour everything.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Pierce, tear apart and sink into the sea.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: This too... is part of the cycle

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Currents converge, fish migrate, you have come back to me again.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Killing, predation and death are just like birth, growth and love. They are just stages in life cycle.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: We are all children of the ocean, destined to converge and combine. Becoming part of each other.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: No matter how deep I dive, I must return to the surface in the end. Humans don't truly belong in the cold deep sea.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Since the beginning of my memory, I have lived in the sea, the land is out of my reach, and human emotions are so complex, I can't get close.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: The truth is a ray of light, colder than the deepest waters. Whoever saw it can't resist chasing its dangerous yet irresistible for there's nothing else left to pursue in the sheer darkness.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I love the summer waves, sunlight reaching the sea floor, migratory birds and fish on the water surface. Would you like to see it too?

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Humans age and die. I don't like it. One day, when you reach the end of your existence, come to me, become one with me, and let us coexist for all eternity.

default.title: Idle
default.text: In this lull between storms, everything is so peaceful.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Uh, stop. The barnacles and shells are sharp. Be careful. I don't want you to get hurt.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Because of you, I returned from the abyss, and you didn't let me down. You are here.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Are we going to the sea?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: The tide has brought them back to the shore.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Deeper... Colder...

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: It feels soft like clusters of algae rushing against my hair. It's strange, but I don't mind it.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Gaze into the abyss...
